LanguageData.CookSpeed.label: cooking speed
LanguageData.CookSpeed.description: Speed at which this person cooks meals.
LanguageData.ButcheryFleshSpeed.label: butchery speed
LanguageData.ButcheryFleshSpeed.description: Speed at which this person butchers flesh creatures.
LanguageData.ButcheryFleshEfficiency.label: butchery efficiency
LanguageData.ButcheryFleshEfficiency.description: Multiplier on the amount of meat produced when butchering flesh animals.
LanguageData.ButcheryMechanoidSpeed.label: mechanoid disassembly speed
LanguageData.ButcheryMechanoidSpeed.description: Speed at which this person can disassemble a mechanoid.
LanguageData.ButcheryMechanoidEfficiency.label: mechanoid disassembly efficiency
LanguageData.ButcheryMechanoidEfficiency.description: Multiplier on the amount of materials yielded when this person disassembles a dead mechanoid.
LanguageData.StonecuttingSpeed.label: stonecutting speed
LanguageData.StonecuttingSpeed.description: Speed at which this person cuts rough stone into blocks.
LanguageData.StonecuttingEfficiency.label: stonecutting efficiency
LanguageData.StonecuttingEfficiency.description: Multiplier on the number of stone blocks produced when this person cuts rough stone into blocks.
LanguageData.TailoringSpeed.label: tailoring speed
LanguageData.TailoringSpeed.description: Speed at which this person makes clothes.
LanguageData.SmithingSpeed.label: smithing speed
LanguageData.SmithingSpeed.description: Speed at which this person smiths weapons and tools.
LanguageData.SmeltingSpeed.label: smelting speed
LanguageData.SmeltingSpeed.description: Speed at which this person smelts things.
LanguageData.SmeltingEfficiency.label: smelting efficiency
LanguageData.SmeltingEfficiency.description: Multiplier on the amount of usable materials yielded when this person smelts something.
